channel.title: LSR on @PSUStevens Blog
channel.description: Recent content in LSR on @PSUStevens Blog

item.title: No Storage Replication Adapters Installed
item.description: As part of my job, I regularly demonstrate Pure Storage features and how VMware solutions integrate seamlessly with our storage platform. Before a demo, I usually will confirm the software I intend to use is in good working order, but this isn’t always the case. The demo lab is used by many of my colleagues.
